PHIL 4.1 Swaei nu, broþrjus meinai liubans jah lustusamans, faheþs jah waips meins, swa standaiþ in fraujin.
PHIL 4.2 Aiodian bidja jasSwntwkein bidja þata samo fraþjan in fraujin.
PHIL 4.3 jai jah þuk waliso bidja gajuko,
niþais þos þozei miþarbaididedun mis in aiwaggeljon miþ Klaimaintau jah anþaraim gawaurstwam meinaim, þizeei namna sind in bokom libainais.
PHIL 4.4 nunu nu faginoþ in fraujin sinteino;
aftra qiþa,
faginoþ!
PHIL 4.5 anawiljei izwara kunþa sijai allaim mannam;
frauja neƕa ist.
PHIL 4.6 ni waihtai maurnaiþ, ak in allai bidai jah aihtronai miþ awiliudam bidos izwaros kunþos sijaina...
PHIL 4.7 jah gawairþi gudis, þatei ufar ist all ahane, fastaiþ hairtona jah leika izwara in Xristau Iesu.

PHIL 4.8 þata anþar, broþrjus, þisƕah þatei ist sunjein, þisƕah þatei gariud, þisƕah þatei garaiht, þisƕah þatei weih, þisƕah þatei liubaleik, þisƕah þatei wailameri, jabai ƕo godeino, jabai ƕo hazeino, þata mitoþ;
PHIL 4.9 þatei jah galaisideduþ izwis jah ganemuþ jah gahausideduþ jah gaseƕuþ in mis, þata taujaiþ, jah guþ gawairþeis sijai miþ izwis.
PHIL 4.10 aþþan faginoda in fraujin mikilaba, unte ju ƕan gaþaihuþ du faur mik fraþjan, ana þammei jah froþuþ; aþþan analatidai waurþuþ.
PHIL 4.11 ni þatei bi þarbai qiþau, unte ik galaisida mik in þaimei im ganohiþs wisan.
PHIL 4.12 lais jah haunjan mik,
lais jah ufarassu haban;
in allamma jah in allaim usþroþiþs im, jah sads wairþan jah gredags, jah ufarassau haban jah þarbos þulan.
PHIL 4.13 all mag in þamma inswinþjandin mik Xristau.
PHIL 4.14 aþþan sweþauh waila gatawideduþ gamainja briggandans meina aglon.
PHIL 4.15 aþþan wituþ jah jus, Filippisius, þatei in anastodeinai aiwaggeljons, þan usiddja af Makidonai, ni ainohun aikklesjono mis gamainida in raþjon gibos jah andanemis, alja jus ainai.
PHIL 4.16 unte jah in Þaissalauneikai jah ainamma sinþa jah twaim andawizn mis insandideduþ.
PHIL 4.17 ni þatei gasokjau giba, ak gasokja akran...
...COL 1.6 in sunjai;
COL 1.7 swaswe ganemuþ at Aipafrin þamma liubin gaskalkja unsaramma, saei ist triggws faur izwis andbahts Xristaus Iesuis, COL 1.8 saei jah gakannida uns izwara friaþwa in ahmin.
COL 1.9 duþþe jah weis, fram þamma daga ei hausidedum, ni ƕeilaidedum faur izwis bidjandans jah aihtrondans, ei fullnaiþ kunþjis wiljins is in allai handugein jah frodein ahmeinai;

...COL 1.10 wairþaba fraujins in allamma þatei galeikai, in allamma waurstwe godaize akran bairandans jah wahsjandans in ufkunþja gudis, COL 1.11 in allai mahtai gaswinþidai bi mahtai wulþaus is, in allai usþulainai jah usbeisnai miþ fahedai, COL 1.12 awiliudondans attin saei laþoda izwis du dailai hlautis weihaize in liuhada, COL 1.13 saei galausida izwis us waldufnja riqizis jah atnam in þiudangardja sunus friaþwos seinaizos, COL 1.14 in þammei habam faurbauht, fralet frawaurhte, COL 1.15 saei ist frisahts gudis ungasaiƕanis, frumabaur allaizos gaskaftais;
COL 1.16 unte in imma gaskapana waurþun alla in himinam jah ana airþai, þo gasaiƕanona jaþþo ungasaiƕanona, jaþþe sitlos jaþþe fraujinassjus, jaþþe reikja jaþþe waldufnja,
alla þairh ina jah in imma gaskapana sind.
COL 1.17 jah is ist faura allaim jah alla in imma ussatida sind.
COL 1.18 jah is ist haubiþ leikis, aikklesjons, saei ist anastodeins, frumabaur us dauþaim, ei sijai in allaim is frumadein habands;
COL 1.19 unte in imma galeikaida alla fullon bauan, COL 1.20 jah þairh ina gafriþon alla in imma, gawairþi taujands þairh bloþ galgins is þairh ina, jaþþe þo ana airþai jaþþe þo ana himinam.

COL 1.21 jah izwis simle wisandans framaþidans jah fijands gahugdai in waurstwam ubilaim, iþ nu gafriþodai COL 1.22 in leika mammons is þairh dauþu du atsatjan izwis weihans jah unwammans jah usfairinans faura imma, COL 1.23 jabai sweþauh þairhwisiþ in galaubeinai gaþwastidai jah gatulgidai jah ni afwagidai af wenai aiwaggeljons, þoei hausideduþ, sei merida ist in alla gaskaft þo uf himina, þizozei warþ ik Pawlus andbahts;
